rooms.description: Art Deco styled entrance hall with decorative motifs and polished marble flooring, following Vastu principles for energy flow.
Spacious living room with geometric Art Deco design elements, large windows for natural light and ventilation.
Formal dining area with minimalistic Art Deco fixtures, designed to be adjacent to the living room.
Fully equipped kitchen designed with Vastu principles ensuring proper ventilation and access to sunlight.
Functional bathroom near the kitchen area, featuring Art Deco fixtures.
Utility room and laundry with efficient storage solutions.
Storage area integrated into the ground floor layout.

openings.description: Main entrance door with Art Deco decorative elements and Vastu compliant positioning.
Large windows on the eastern wall to capture morning sunlight in accordance with Vastu principles.
Direct access between kitchen and living room for functional flow.

rooms.description: Master bedroom with a private balcony that overlooks the eastern side, featuring Art Deco detailing and adequate natural light.
Second bedroom with a dedicated balcony on the north side for privacy and natural lighting.
Third bedroom with a small private balcony oriented towards the south to maintain harmony per Vastu guidelines.
Additional bathroom for convenience, designed with modern fixtures and maintaining Art Deco aesthetics.
Multipurpose study/reading room adjoining one of the bedrooms, with ample natural light and ventilation.

openings.description: Private balcony door in master bedroom ensuring direct outdoor access.
Window designed to allow ample daylight and maintain Vastu airflow.

notes: The layout is designed to optimize natural light and ventilation while incorporating Art Deco design elements. All spatial arrangements consider Vastu principles for energy flow, auspicious entrance directions, and room placement.
